title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6192.7 - Restriction of access to information systems
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6192.7 - Restriction of access to information systems

State Regulations

Access to record information system facilities, systems
operating environments and data file contents (whether while in use or when
stored in a media library) shall be restricted to authorized personnel only. These restrictions shall be assured through compliance by the laboratory with
the accreditation standards promulgated by the commission in Part 6190 of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6192.7

Amended

New

York State Register June 7, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 23, eff. 6/7/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
